name: Couch Coach
description:
Help your favourite football team win by choosing the right outfit to wear!

Unlock the puzzle of this time-honoured ritual, as you mastermind your team to victory!

Made for Global Game Jam, 2016.

By @MattWoelk
Music by @grahamisaak and @TheKoop13
With help from @uberben

Use arrow keys or controller directional buttons to play.
